attributes.action: Ensure that all armed forces servicemen and women are paid more than the national minimum hourly rate for their work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was appalled to discover that most entry level soldiers earn less than the minimum hourly wage and that 'most' army families survive only by receiving income support. In order for the UK to be protected we need dedicared service personnel who are paid a decent wage for their incredible but unacknowledged work. We also need to encourage new recruits with a decent salary.
